quotes.message: The knowledge that makes us cherish innocence makes innocence unattainable.
quotes.name: Irving Howe

quotes.message: It is better that ten guilty persons escape than that one innocent suffer.
quotes.name: William Blackstone

quotes.message: Once you start asking questions, innocence is gone.
quotes.name: Mary Astor

quotes.message: Innocence tinctures all things with brightest hues.
quotes.name: Edward Counsel

quotes.message: Always the innocent are the first victims. So it has been for ages past, so it is now.
quotes.name: J. K. Rowling

quotes.message: Innocence eroded into nightmare. All because of very bad touch. Love, corrupted.
quotes.name: Ellen Hopkins

quotes.message: It takes a very long time to become young.
quotes.name: Pablo Picasso

quotes.message: Innocence is a kind of insanity.
quotes.name: Graham Greene

quotes.message: The trust of the innocent is the liar's most useful tool.
quotes.name: Stephen King

quotes.message: When we take revenge against another, we lose some of our innocence.
quotes.name: Patrice Redd Vecchione

quotes.message: We each begin in innocence. We all become guilty.
quotes.name: Leonard F. Peltier

quotes.message: The most sophisticated people I know inside they are all children.
quotes.name: Jim Henson

quotes.message: We've let the blade of our innocence dull over time, and it's only in innocence that you find any kind of magic, any kind of courage.
quotes.name: Sean Penn

quotes.message: The presumption of innocence only means you don't go right to jail.
quotes.name: Ann Coulter

quotes.message: Remaining childish is a tremendous state of innocence.
quotes.name: John Lydon

quotes.message: The innocence that feels no risk and is taught no caution, is more vulnerable than guilt, and oftener assailed.
quotes.name: Nathaniel Parker Willis

quotes.message: There's nothing more contagious than the laughter of young children; it doesn't even have to matter what they're laughing about.
quotes.name: Criss Jami

quotes.message: I'm interested in how innocence fares when it collides with hard reality.
quotes.name: Geoffrey S. Fletcher

quotes.message: Innocence is one of the most exciting things in the world.
quotes.name: Eartha Kitt

quotes.message: Unfortunately the innocent are always involved in any conflict. Always, everywhere, there is some voice crying from a tower.
quotes.name: Graham Greene

quotes.message: Innocence could be considered a discrete state of mind.
quotes.name: John Shirley

quotes.message: I have always said that innocence is much more powerful than experience.
quotes.name: Alejandro Gonzalez Inarritu

quotes.message: The sweet converse of an innocent mind.
quotes.name: John Keats

quotes.message: There is an innocence in admiration: it occurs in one who has not yet realized that they might one day be admired.
quotes.name: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.message: Innocence is like a dumb leper who has lost his bell, wandering the world, meaning no harm.
quotes.name: Graham Greene

quotes.message: The worst of us is not without innocence, although buried deeply it might be.
quotes.name: Walt Disney

quotes.message: Innocence does not find near so much protection as guilt.
quotes.name: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.message: No man knows the value of innocence and integrity but he who has lost them.
quotes.name: William Godwin

quotes.message: For children are innocent and love justice, while most of us are wicked and naturally prefer mercy.
quotes.name: G.K. Chesterton

quotes.message: There is but one resource for innocence among men or women, and that is an embargo upon all commerce of bad men.
quotes.name: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.message: Whoever blushes is already guilty; true innocence is ashamed of nothing.
quotes.name: Jean-Jacques Rousseau

quotes.message: Innocence ends when one is stripped of the delusion that one likes oneself.
quotes.name: Joan Didion

quotes.message: The innocence of childhood is like the innocence of a lot of animals.
quotes.name: Clint Eastwood

quotes.message: All things truly wicked start from an innocence.
quotes.name: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.message: In their innocence, very young children know themselves to be light and love. If we will allow them, they can teach us to see ourselves the same way.
quotes.name: Michael Jackson

quotes.message: Innocence is like polished armor; it adorns and defends.
quotes.name: Robert South

quotes.message: Go in thy native innocence, rely on what thou hast of virtue, summon all, for God towards thee hath done his part, do thine.
quotes.name: John Milton

quotes.message: It's innocence when it charms us, ignorance when it doesn't.
quotes.name: Mignon McLaughlin

quotes.message: Innocence is always unsuspicious.
quotes.name: Joseph Joubert

quotes.message: No one loses their innocence. It is either taken or given away willingly.
quotes.name: Tiffany Madison

quotes.message: An honest man is always a child.
quotes.name: Socrates

quotes.message: Innocence is thought charming because it offers delightful possibilities for exploitation.
quotes.name: Mason Cooley

quotes.message: Innocence: I am only stepping on your face because it lies in my path.
quotes.name: Mason Cooley

quotes.message: Through our own recovered innocence we discern the innocence of our neighbors.
quotes.name: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.message: The essential self is innocent, and when it tastes its own innocence knows that it lives for ever.
quotes.name: John Updike

quotes.message: It is better to risk saving a guilty person than to condemn an innocent one.
quotes.name: Voltaire

quotes.message: I read the dreams upon her face. Through dimples in her cheek, and smiles which trace the subtle grace of innocence asleep.
quotes.name: Samuel Alfred Beadle

quotes.message: Innocence bleeding, within the deep warm incision of a preternatural beginning.
quotes.name: Kurt Philip Behm

quotes.message: When we are children we seldom think of the future. This innocence leaves us free to enjoy ourselves as few adults can. The day we fret about the future is the day we leave our childhood behind.
quotes.name: Patrick Rothfuss

quotes.message: It is more important that innocence be protected than it is that guilt be punished, for guilt and crimes are so frequent in this world that they cannot all be punished.
quotes.name: John Adams

quotes.message: We are born with our heads turned back, but my mother says we have to face into the future now. You have to earn your own innocence, she says. You have to grow up and become innocent.
quotes.name: Hugo Hamilton

quotes.message: Innocence ain't all it's cracked up to be, you know. Innocent little kids rip the wings off flies, because they don't know any better. That's innocence.
quotes.name: Joe Hill

quotes.message: That's the beautiful thing about innocence; even monsters have a pocketful of childhood memories with which to seek comfort with.
quotes.name: Dave Matthes

quotes.message: Innocence invites protection, yet we might be smarter to protect ourselves against it.
quotes.name: Megan Johns

quotes.message: Innocence always calls mutely for protection when we would be so much wiser to guard ourselves against it
quotes.name: Graham Greene

quotes.message: You can call it innocence, or you can call it gullibility.
quotes.name: Lionel Shriver

quotes.message: There are many more layers to innocence than one might ever imagine, and we are ever unaware of them until each barrier is breached.
quotes.name: Paula Reed

quotes.message: Innocence is not the prerogative of infants and puppies, and far less of mountains and fixed stars, which have no prerogatives at all. It is not lost to us; the world is a better place than that.
quotes.name: Annie Dillard

quotes.message: What I call innocence is the spirit’s unselfconscious state at any moment of pure devotion to any object.
quotes.name: Annie Dillard

quotes.message: Childhood innocence was a hell of a drug.
quotes.name: Lily Seabrooke

quotes.message: Innocence, that mild form of mental deficiency, has the same aphrodisiac effect as softness of skin.
quotes.name: Jean Baudrillard

quotes.message: An hour of innocence builds more trust than years of diplomacy.
quotes.name: Abhijit Naskar

quotes.message: Innocence is something we humans pass through and leave behind, unable to return. But animals live and die in that state, and seeing innocence violated in the form of cruelty to a mere duck can seem like the most barbaric act in the world.
quotes.name: The Friend: A Novel

quotes.message: But innocence is only pleasurable because it is transient.
quotes.name: Iain Pears

quotes.message: A childlike innocence is requested by existence. Every time, in every circumstance – a priceless purity.
quotes.name: Ilie Cioara

quotes.message: Innocence was a luxury.
quotes.name: Leigh Bardugo

quotes.message: Innocence is a temporary, maybe even an unreal, condition. Destined to die.
quotes.name: Patricia Hampl

quotes.message: Innocence lost is supposed to be experience gained, and therefore not a bad trade.
quotes.name: Patricia Hampl

quotes.message: The consciousness of innocence is an excellent anchor, no doubt.
quotes.name: Albert Payson Terhune
